name: treatment of salt tailing from potash mine, residual material landfill | salt tailing from potash mine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8828/documentation

This dataset represents the activity of waste disposal of 'salt tailing from potash mine' in a residual material landfill (RMLF). Recommended use of this dataset: The waste are non-target salts and minerals separated during the mining and refining of potash (KCO3, KOH).  Inventoried waste consists of fraction: 100% salt tailings potash mining; .  Waste composition (wet, in ppmw): H2O na; O 98835; H na; C na; S 49521; N na; P na; B na; Cl 498570; Br na; F na; I na; Ag na; As na; Ba na; Cd na; Co na; Cr na; Cu na; Hg na; Mn na; Mo na; Ni na; Pb na; Sb na; Se na; Sn na; V na; Zn na; Be na; Sc na; Sr na; Ti na; Tl na; W na; Si na; Fe na; Ca 8241.3; Al na; K 6363.9; Mg 47830; Na 290630.  Share of carbon in initial waste input that is biogenic 61.4%. 

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity ends with the waste being treated and waste-specific emissions from the landfill are released to the water (short-term emissions to water from leachate and long-term emissions to ground water).
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset represents a landfill site with mean annual temperature (MAT) of 16.743579766537 degC, mean annual precipitation (MAP) of 1250.84108527132 mm/year, mean annual actual evaporation (EAT) of 460.58904958214 mm/year, and net infiltration of 790.3 mm/year. The leachate percolating through the residual material landfill has an average residence time of 4.43 years.;Reference for climatic parameters:;UN data, 2020. Precipitation, Environment Statistics Database, United Nations Statistics Division Available at: http://data.un.org/Data.aspx?q=precipitation&d=ENV&f=variableID%3a6;;World Bank, 2022. Surface area (sq.km), World Bank Group Available at: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/AG.SRF.TOTL.K2;
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Residual material landfill for polluted, inorganic waste (VVEA Type C). With base seal and leachate collection system. Ultimate average landfill height is 10 meters. Operation phase duration is 30 years. Recultivation after closure. No additional solidification with cement requested. Based on average waste composition and climate data the end of carbonate phase in the residual material landfill is estimated to be reached after 60 000 years.
